definitions.text: a particular society at a particular time and place
the tastes in art and manners that are favored by a social group
all the knowledge and values shared by a society
(biology) the growing of microorganisms in a nutrient medium (such as gelatin or agar)
examples: the culture of cells in a Petri dish

definitions.text: a highly developed state of perfection; having a flawless or impeccable quality; ; ; --Joseph Conrad
examples: I admired the exquisite refinement of his prose
almost an inspiration which gives to all work that finish which is almost art

definitions.text: the attitudes and behavior that are characteristic of a particular social group or organization
examples: the reason that the agency is doomed to inaction has something to do with the FBI culture

definitions.text: the raising of plants or animals
